casebody.data:
WRIGHT
v.
N.C. DEPT. OF HEALTH. No. 517P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. Brenda Eaddy, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Dept. of Health.

*265The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of September 2005 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
